name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Route AZKi 3D Acoustic LIVE 「Route If」アルバムリリース記念ライブ【#ルートAZKiライブ】 [0NXvBO1E6fM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'secret base 〜君がくれたもの〜'.
Transition and performance of the song '君の知らない物語'.

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月 また出会えるのを信じて
subtitles.english: Believe that we can meet again in August, ten years from now

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を…
subtitles.english: The best memories...

subtitles.original: 出会いは ふとした瞬間
subtitles.english: Our meeting was an unexpected moment

subtitles.original: 帰り道の交差点で
subtitles.english: At the intersection on the way home

subtitles.original: 声をかけてくれたね
subtitles.english: You called out to me

subtitles.original: 「一緒に帰ろう」
subtitles.english: “Let's go home together”

subtitles.original: 僕は 照れくさそうに
subtitles.english: I, looking embarrassed,

subtitles.original: カバンで顔を隠しながら
subtitles.english: hiding my face with my bag

subtitles.original: 本当はとてもとても嬉しかったよ
subtitles.english: was actually very, very happy

subtitles.original: あぁ 花火が夜空 きれいに咲いて ちょっと切なく
subtitles.english: Ah, the fireworks bloomed beautifully in the night sky, making me a bit sentimental

subtitles.original: あぁ 風が時間とともに流れる
subtitles.english: Ah, the wind flows together with time

subtitles.original: 嬉しくて 楽しくて
subtitles.english: Happy and fun,

subtitles.original: 冒険も いろいろしたね
subtitles.english: we went on many adventures

subtitles.original: 二人の 秘密の基地の中
subtitles.english: Inside our secret base

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり 将来の夢
subtitles.english: With you at the end of summer, our future dreams

subtitles.original: 大きな希望 忘れない
subtitles.english: And big hopes, I won't forget them

subtitles.english: Believe that we can meet again in August, ten years from now

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで 心から
subtitles.english: That you, until the very end, from your heart,

subtitles.original: 「ありがとう」叫んでいたこと 知ってたよ
subtitles.english: shouted “Thank you,” I knew that

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて 笑顔でさよなら
subtitles.english: Holding back tears, saying goodbye with a smile

subtitles.original: せつないよね
subtitles.english: It's painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を…
subtitles.english: The best memories...

subtitles.original: あぁ 夏休みも あと少しで終わっちゃうから
subtitles.english: Ah, because summer vacation is almost over

subtitles.english: Ah, let the sun and moon get along

subtitles.english: Forever, inside our base
